title: WiseTech takes a beating as research firm gets stuck in
text:
WiseTech Global is the latest Australian company to come under fire from an offshore research firm.

J Capital Research published a scathing report at lunchtime on Thursday, which sent WiseTech shares down more than 10 per cent before its shares were halted from trading.

The report accused WiseTech of overstating profit and organic growth and said its reported European revenue growth was "suspect".

Street Talk. Peter Braig

"We estimate that overstated profit in the three years since WiseTech listed may be as high as $116 mln. That would be an overstatement of 178%," the report said.

J Capital's report landed as WiseTech shares were trading above $30 and close to an all-time high.
description: WiseTech Global is the latest Australian company to come under fire from an offshore research firm.
